segments.script_part: Warren Buffett just did something he's never done before.

pose.description: Character leaning forward toward camera with intensity

visual.image_prompt: Warren Buffett portrait in business suit with serious expression, iconic glasses, professional headshot with subtle American flag in background, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: Berkshire Hathaway is now holding three hundred eighty-two billion dollars in cash—more than his entire stock portfolio.

pose.description: Character pointing toward the RIGHT screen with strong emphasis

segments.script_part: Let that sink in. The greatest investor of all time is choosing Treasury bills over stocks.

pose.description: Character with hands together facing camera, serious tone

visual.image_prompt: Large stack of US Treasury bills and cash money piled high, with '$382 BILLION' text overlay, financial documents visible, professional banking aesthetic, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: Why? Because he sees what most investors are ignoring. The S&P 500 is trading at twenty-one times earnings, well above its historical average.

pose.description: Character with hand raised, gesturing toward the RIGHT while explaining

visual.image_prompt: Stock market valuation chart showing P/E ratio at 21x with historical average line at 15-16x, upward trending line indicating overvaluation, clear axis labels and data points, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: Buffett has been a net seller for eight straight quarters, slashing his Apple stake by sixty-seven percent.

pose.description: Character in serious discussion pose facing camera, focused expression

visual.image_prompt: Apple Inc. logo with downward arrow showing 67% reduction, stock certificate imagery, selling transaction concept, financial divestment visualization, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: He's not panicking—he's positioning. This cash pile generates five billion dollars a year in risk-free returns while he waits for better prices.

pose.description: Character standing confidently while presenting, body angled slightly toward the RIGHT

visual.image_prompt: Money tree growing from pile of cash with '$5 BILLION/YEAR' text, compound interest visualization, passive income concept, financial growth metaphor, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: History shows us the pattern: Buffett hoards cash during expensive markets, then deploys it aggressively during crashes.

pose.description: Character with both hands open, presenting toward the RIGHT side screen

visual.image_prompt: Historical timeline showing Buffett's cash positions and deployment cycles, 2008 financial crisis marker, buy/sell pattern visualization, cyclical market behavior chart, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: In two thousand eight, his opportunistic investments in Goldman Sachs and Bank of America made billions.

pose.description: Character nodding with impressed expression toward the RIGHT

visual.image_prompt: Goldman Sachs and Bank of America logos with upward profit arrows, 2008 crisis opportunity visualization, successful investment returns chart, financial crisis deals, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: So what's the takeaway? When the Oracle of Omaha is selling, it's time to be cautious.

pose.description: Character with raised hand in stop gesture toward camera

visual.image_prompt: Caution warning sign with stock market imagery, yellow alert triangle, 'PROCEED WITH CAUTION' text, risk management concept, investor warning symbol, style: black and white vector graphic.

segments.script_part: Build your cash reserves. Wait for quality at reasonable prices. Because when the market gives Buffett his discount, he'll be ready. Will you?

pose.description: Character making emphatic hand gesture while speaking to camera

visual.image_prompt: Person building a fortress of cash and defensive assets, shield with dollar sign, portfolio protection concept, strategic positioning visualization, readiness and preparation theme, style: black and white vector graphic.
